list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the offspring of two plants or animals of different species or varieties, such as a mule (a hybrid of a donkey and a horse).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a hybrid of wheat and rye
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một con lai lúa mì và lúa mạch đen

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing made by combining two different elements; a mixture.
of mixed character; composed of mixed parts.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Văn hóa lai postconquest lai của Mexico
